channel.title: Commands to bring up menus?
channel.description: I need help on a command such as ::help that would bring up a page where I could put how to make money and other things about the server. Could someone please help me with this?

item.title: Commands to bring up menus?
item.dc:creator: @burg355 burg355
item.description:
@burg355 wrote:

need to search help menu

and in there put :[code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mainmenu”)) {

        MainHelpMenu();	[/code]

[code] if (playerRights <= 4) {

        sendQuest("TITLE", 8144); // Title
        clearQuestInterface();
        sendQuest("RULES", 8145);
        sendQuest("----", 8147);
        sendQuest("1. DONT SWEAR", 8148);
        sendQuest("2. DONT STEAL PASSWORDS", 8149);
        sendQuest("3. DONT DUPE ITEMS", 8150);
        sendQuest("", 8151); // all these are where u can type each one is a single line so line 5
        sendQuest("", 8152);// line 6
        sendQuest("", 8153);// line 7 etc               JUST AN EXAMPLE 
        sendQuest("", 8154);
        sendQuest("", 8155);
        sendQuest("Enjoy the server!", 8156);
        sendQuest("", 8157);
        sendQuest("", 8158);
        sendQuest("Please follow and obey the rules!", 8159);
        sendQuestSomething(8143);
        showInterface(8134);
        flushOutStream();
    }[/code]

Read full topic
